1.title: Heavy Cargo: Shocks
1.plot: Our Nissan NV 2500 cargo van gets 14-inch coilovers and bypass shocks, making it ready for the rocks.

2.title: Blazing Arizona
2.plot: We take a custom-equipped cargo van through the rocks of Tonto National Forest in Payson, Arizona.

3.title: Buckin' Bronco: Sway Bar
3.plot: The Bronco-inspired tube buggy receives an anti-roll system designed for hardcore desert racing.

4.title: Two-In-One Transmission
4.plot: We mix and match the best pieces from a Turbo 400 and a 4L80E to make one killer custom transmission.

5.title: Land Rover Defender
5.plot: A vintage 80's Land Rover becomes the foundation of a fully-loaded expedition rig.

6.title: Defender 90: Axles
6.plot: The Land Rover expedition rig loses the stock axles for some fully-gusseted ,1-ton axle assemblies.

7.title: Expedition Defender: Drivetrain
7.plot: A JK frame under a Defender body requires careful drivetrain mockup, but the result will be well worth it.

8.title: Xtreme Xpedition Body Mods
8.plot: Our 1984 Defender body goes under the knife to accomodate a chassis full of modern components.

9.title: Inside the Diesel Engine
9.plot: We've put many Cummins diesels in our projects. Today, we take a look inside their state-of-the-art facility.

10.title: Dual-Purpose Tacoma
10.plot: The Toyota Tacoma is the foundation for a rig that's perfect for daily driving and weekend wheeling.

11.title: Tacoma on the Trail
11.plot: We button up our dual-purpose Tacoma, and put it through the paces on the road and in the dirt.

20.title: COMMANDO DRIVETRAIN
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Rock Bouncer
1.plot: Building a radical rock racer from scratch.

2.title: Dirt Cheap Fun
2.plot: Rare turbo Toyota powers low buck rig.

3.title: Crawler Hauler
3.plot: Isuzu chase truck gets ready for Cummins diesel.

4.title: Beefier T Case
4.plot: Details on upgrading a 4x4 transfer case.

6.title: Exo-Skeleton Cage
6.plot: How to make & fit an off-road exo-cage.

7.title: Sheet Metal Mods
7.plot: Fixing rusted doors, rockers and a new roll pan.

8.title: Sr. Silverado: Smoother Front and Rear
8.plot: Custom sport truck tech - a smooth front bumper and grill install, plus how-to smooth the tail gate with an inside latch.

9.title: Rock Bouncer IBS Install
9.plot: Big block "Rock Bouncer" gets high dollar internal bypass shock system while "Hocus Focus" gets a low-buck suspension.

10.title: Crawler Hauler: 4 Link & Airbags
10.plot: Ian stretches the wheelbase of "Crawler Hauler" with a custom 4 link rear suspension and air bags to lower the bed for loading.

11.title: Project: "Hocus Focus"
11.plot: Budget off-road Ford Focus project gets prepped for low-buck rally racing with an engine tuneup, intake, and brakes.

12.title: 4 Speed Tutorial: GM's 4L60-E
12.plot: What you need to know about how to rebuild and upgrade GM's 4L60E four speed automatic overdrive transmission.

13.title: Diesel
13.plot: More lift and more rubber: Ian transforms a new Ram 2500 Cummins diesel with a BDS lift and a dual-rear wheel conversion.

14.title: Diesel Complete
14.plot: Ian finishes "Project Big Rig Ram" with a semi-inspired stacked exhaust system, a performance tuner and power side steps.

15.title: Project Hocus Focus: Roll Cage
15.plot: How-to design, bend, and weld up a sanctioned roll cage for our low-buck rally race. Plus: remote air bag tech.

16.title: Rock Bouncer: Rock Race Axles
16.plot: How-to build bomb-proof axles with custom trusses, spools, and giant shafts to conquer extreme rock bouncer races.

17.title: Ultimate UTV
17.plot: How to transform a stock RZR side by side into the ultimate UTV with trick suspension and accessories.

18.title: King of the Hammers Special
18.plot: 155 ULTRA4 racers battle through 194 miles of punishing desert and rocks at the 2014 KOH championship.

19.title: : The Payoff
19.plot: Hybrid six wheel Ford body/Dodge Cummins diesel rolls out of the shop for its maiden asphalt twisting payoff.

20.title: Hocus Focus: How to Rally Cross
20.plot: Ian finishes his Focus rally car and heads to Florida to hone his 2WD and 4WD driving skills at "The FIRM".

21.title: Veteran XJ: Size Matters
21.plot: Military team stretches a Jeep Cherokee chassis 9" with 4 link sub-frames for ultimate rock rig tribute.

22.title: Classic Chevy/Modern Ford
22.plot: A '54 five window Chevy gets cooling system upgrade and team dyno tunes 75 extra ponies from EcoBoost V6.

23.title: Field Tests Galore
23.plot: Ian shows off his low-buck projects with final payoffs from a $5k compact 4x4 pickup to his dirt cheap rally car.

1.title: WD40 Specialist Jeep - Chassis
1.plot: Vintage YJ gets transformed into radical trail rig with custom 4 link tube chassis, aluminum body and LS V8.

2.title: WD40 Specialist Jeep - Driveline
2.plot: Extreme YJ project gets fuel injection, big axles, air lockers plus a new racing transfer case and 42" tires.

3.title: Fluid Transfer
3.plot: Ian fabs up high end systems to cool 700 HP big block and hydraulically steer massive off-road tires.

4.title: Bullet Proof Driveline
4.plot: How to build custom 4x4 driveshafts, install a full race T-case plus we visit Ultra 4's tough new track in Sturgis, KY.

5.title: Automatic to Manual
5.plot: Ian converts his low-buck rally racer from an automatic to a five speed manual and flogs it in combat.

6.title: Project - LockJaw
6.plot: Rare 45 year old Kaiser military Jeep gets junkyard rebuild bobbing the bed and locking the axles.

7.title: WD40 Specialist Jeep - Payoff
7.plot: Ian buttons up his hard-core Jeep trail rig and gives this trick YJ a serious shake down in the rough.

8.title: Pinion Brake Tech
8.plot: How to stop an 11,000 pound monster truck as Ian rebuilds the pinion brakes on the original BigFoot.

9.title: Lock Jaw: Hemi
9.plot: Ian tears down and refreshes a junkyard 5.7L Hemi for his '68 military Kaiser Jeep off-road rat rod.

10.title: DIY Shop Tools
10.plot: Ian shows how-to fabricate heavy duty shop tools needed for 4x4 projects, plus how-to build hydraulic steering.

11.title: Lock Jaw: Final Prep
11.plot: Ian wraps up his junkyard military Jeep fabricating a custom stainless exhaust and plumbing the fuel system.

12.title: Lock Jaw: Cage Fight
12.plot: Ian bullet-proofs his rusted out M715 Jeep building the ultimate driver cage using a high tech tubing bender.

13.title: Lock Jaw: Moab or Bust
13.plot: Ian finishes his Kaiser 4WD just in time to baptize the junkyard recovery Jeep on the red rocks of Moab, Utah.

14.title: PowerStroke Chase Rig: Part I
14.plot: Ian starts a desert chase truck project lifting an F250 with a 4-link 6" suspension, big brakes and cast wheels.

15.title: PowerStroke Chase Rig: Part II
15.plot: Ian finishes lifted Ford recovery vehicle with upgraded tune, power running boards, and trick bed storage system.

16.title: DIY Axle Setup
16.plot: Ian shows how to save bucks setting up a Dana 60 and 14-bolt with gears, shafts and knuckles.

17.title: Raging Bull Rock Bouncer
17.plot: Ian finishes radical rock bouncer with massive 40-spline shafts to handle 700-HP big-block.

18.title: 4x4 Mayhem
18.plot: Ian gets down and dirty as the Raging Bull rock bouncer rolls out on a full-throttle, hard-hitting field test.

19.title: Seargeant Savage: Part I
19.plot: Ian and industry volunteers transform a daily driver TJ into a hardcore off-road rig for an injured Marine.

20.title: Seargeant Savage: Part II
20.plot: Ian and team continue their Jeep build for an injured veteran with modified frame, 4 1/2" radius arm suspension and 35" tires.

21.title: Seargeant Savage: Part III
21.plot: Our military TJ goes to boot camp, getting aluminum body armor - then Ian gives Lance Corporal Curtin the keys to his tricked out rig.

22.title: Post-Trail Tech
22.plot: Ian shows how to repair some serious trail damage, then Jeep JK owners take the ultimate tour of the south.

23.title: Running with the Bull
23.plot: Ultimate trail test for Project Raging Bull as our homemade rock bouncer kills hills.

1.title: Discount Datsun
1.plot: Starting with an '81 Datsun diesel pickup and a $10k budget, we'll build a capable, one-of-a-kind rock crawler.

2.title: Project: Buckin' Bronco
2.plot: A set of body panels and some steel tubing are the foundation of an ULTRA4-inspired race truck with classic Bronco style.

3.title: Discount Datsun Part II
3.plot: Our diesel pickup receives a 4-link suspension, DIY beadlocks, and aggressive 42" tires.

4.title: Buckin' Bronco Part II
4.plot: Our '66 Bronco has plenty of vintage style...but it will receive a lightweight, modern EFI engine for top performance.

5.title: Discount Datsun Shocks
5.plot: Our 1981 diesel pickup gets 14" air shocks on all four corners, giving us plenty of articulation on the trail. Plus: an oxy-fuel torch can save you time when welding thick metal.

6.title: Skinning the Buckin' Bronco
6.plot: Fresh sheet metal will make our Buckin' Bronco desert racer look like the classic '66 Ford. Plus: Our 1981 diesel pickup gets beefy drive shafts on the cheap.

7.title: Discount Datsun on the Trail
7.plot: Our $10k budget build flexes its muscle on the trail. You don't have to have a big budget for big fun.

8.title: Suburban Survival
8.plot: We take a beat-up Suburban and outfit it with everything our inner survivalist could ever want.

9.title: Suburban Survival: Axles
9.plot: Our "end-of-the-world" Suburban gets military-grade protal axles for maximum performance and reliability.

10.title: Buckin' Bronco
10.plot: Our desert racer gets seats and safety belts designed for maximum comfort and safety. Plus, a custom welding cart that holds everythign you need.

11.title: Driveshaft 101
11.plot: Ian gives you all the info you need to build reliable, heavy-duty driveshafts for your of-road rig.

12.title: Suburban Survival: 6x6
12.plot: Our post-apocalyptic Chevy gets even more "Xtreme" with not two, but three bomb-proof portal axles.

13.title: Moab Madness
13.plot: It's the ultimate field trip. We visit Moab for the 50th anniversary of the Easter Jeep Safari.

14.title: Buckin' Bronco Back Half
14.plot: Our Coyote-powered desert racer project continues, as we prep the chassis for a high-tech suspension setup.

15.title: Suburban Survival: Body Mods
15.plot: We modify the body of our survivalist Chevy to fit a custo-designed 6x6 driveline, then tear into the suspension of a '16 GMC Denali.

16.title: Deluxe Denali
16.plot: Our custom GMC Denali chase rig receives race truck-inspired bed storage and high-end off road lighting, then our Bronco gets an innovative fuel system.

17.title: Jeep L J Hemi Swap
17.plot: To get more power and performance, we swap the stock engine in our L J for a Hemi.

18.title: Unlimited Off-Road Expo
18.plot: Ian visits the Unlimited Off-Road Expo in Louisville....and does a Jeep JK build in front of a live audience.

19.title: Adventure Jeep Body Mods
19.plot: The Adventure Jeep receives heavy-duty body armor, and an easy-to-install pickup bed kit.

20.title: Nissan NV: Diesel Engine
20.plot: Our first-ever 4x4 van gets a Cummins 5.0L diesel engine and other upgrades.

21.title: Adventure Jeep Axles
21.plot: The Adventure Jeep build continues, with custom 9" axles designed for serious wheeling.

22.title: Nissan NV: Heavy Cargo
22.plot: Our Nissan NV 2500 van becomes a 4x4 beast, with a diesel powerplant and heavy-duty axles.

23.title: XOR Adventure Ride
23.plot: The Xtreme crew leads an epic group trail ride, hitting four off-road parks in four days.

-1.title: Veteran XJ: Deep Gears
-1.plot: Military tribute Jeep gets deep gear treatment with how-to install an Atlas transfer and re-gear front and rear differentials.

imdb.title: PowerNation: Xtreme Off Road
plot: Metal working skills are shared by co-hosts Jeremy Weckman and Eliza Leon as viewers learn how to fab and weld custom crawlers, buggies, diesels and 4x4s before punishing them on the trail.
